docs.lead_paragraph: THE RYERSON-STREET ARSON CASE.--The examination of this case, commenced before Justice MOREHOUSE, on Tuesday last, was concluded yesterday, MICHAEL O' NEIL and MABIA, his wife, were arrested on complaint of Fire-Marshal BELKNAP, for setting fire to the house occupied by them in Ryerson-street, near Myrtle-avenue,

docs.snippet: BURNING OF A FAT-MELTING ESTABLISHMENT,  $13,000--The fat-melting establishment of Mr. JOHN J. EOKEL, located in Forty-fifth-street, near First-avenue, was totally destroyed by fire about 8 A. M., yesterday. The bells promptly gave the alarm, but the...
docs.lead_paragraph: BURNING OF A FAT-MELTING ESTABLISHMENT, $13,000--The fat-melting establishment of Mr. JOHN J. EOKEL, located in Forty-fifth-street, near First-avenue, was totally destroyed by fire about 8 A. M., yesterday. The bells promptly gave the alarm, but the unseasonable hour prevented the usual early attendance of the firemen.

docs.snippet: A DEATH IN BROOKLYN FROM YELLOW FEVER.--On the 29th of June the brig John Boynton, from Port-au-Prince, arrived at this port with a cargo of coffee and logwood. According to the Health Officer's report to the Board of Health, the Captain had been...
docs.lead_paragraph: A DEATH IN BROOKLYN FROM YELLOW FEVER.--On the 29th of June the brig John Boynton, from Port-au-Prince, arrived at this port with a cargo of coffee and logwood. According to the Health Officer's report to the Board of Health, the Captain had been several days ill with bilious fever, and one of the crew was down " with a fever of doubtful character."

headline.main: THE WAR IN EUROPE.; ARRIVAL OF THE ASIA. The Great Battle on the Mincio, Between Peschicra and Mantua. Tremendous Defeat of the Austrians after Sixteen Hours' Fighting. Advance of Prince Napoleon from Modena. IMPORTANT DEMONSTRATIONS OF PRUSSIA Troubled State of Politics in England. RESOLUTE ATTITUDE OF FRANCE. Atrocious Conduct of the Papal Troops, and Political Anxieties Throughout Italy. March of the French Towards the Tyrol. ACCIDENT TO THE CITY OF BALTIMORE. COMMERCIAL INTELLIGENCE. THE LONDON MONEY MARKET.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Royal Mail steamship Asia, Capt. LOTT, which sailed from Liverpool at about 2 o'clock P. M. on the 25th of June, arrived here at an early hour yesterday morning. The steamship Great Britain was advertised to leave Liverpool on the 30th June, and the Cunard steamer Line on the 2d July, both for New-York direct.
